text: Attached patch cleans the code and loads JSS13Factory in the same way as 1.4 and 1.5 factories. Loading it dynamically enables you to rm the actual classes so you are able to compile the 5.5 code base with a JDK that does not have the Sun internal ssl classes.
creator: betelgeuse@gentoo.org

text: Thanks for the patch. I have proposed it for 5.5.x.
creator: markt@apache.org

text: As per Bill's comments, this will not be applied as it breaks SSL support on 1.5/1.6 JVMs if Tomcat was compiled on a 1.4 JVM (as is the case for 4.1.x).
creator: markt@apache.org
